examples: Two, or three at the very most, of the prefixes or postfixes are quite sufficient for one day's lesson.

verbs.description: postfix (third-person singular simple present postfixes, present participle postfixing, simple past and past participle postfixed)

examples: Verbs with י for the first radical, often drop it in the future, imperative, and infinitive of Kal, to which last they postfix ת‎ (לקח‎ to take, follows this form), and in Niph. and Hiph. they change י into ו.

entries.meaning: (biology) To subject a sample to postfixation
